version_description: This update contains minor bug fixes.
This update contains minor bug fixes.
This update fixes drawing of the calendar when running iOS 10.
This update fixes drawing of the calendar when running iOS 10.

Important: If you are synching Timelime with other iPhones or Macs, ensure to update Timelime to the latest version on all devices.

• Widget
You can now quickly start and stop timers for your recent tasks from a newly added widget.

• Simultaneous timers
Run multiple timers at the same time. You can enable this feature in Timelime’s preferences.

• Improved Synchronization
Running timers now synchronize to be able to start and stop timers on different devices. iCloud sync is now much faster using CloudKit technology.

• Time rounding
Configure rounding of recorded times for individual tasks or groups of tasks.

• Archive tasks
You can now archive tasks and optionally hide them in the task list.

• Custom week start
Set a custom ‘first day of the week’, independent of the system setting.

Thanks for using Timelime, enjoy!
